source: At the end of the day
definitions: When everything is taken into consideration; ultimately.
After all the relevant factors have been considered.
examples: At the end of the day, it's your decision.
We can try different approaches, but at the end of the day, we need results.
He has many excuses, but at the end of the day, he didn't finish the work.
lemma: at the end of the day
synonyms: when all is said and done
